ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Medley Overhaul
ygData.msgSnippet: ... BUMP Moonflower Bllue, level 40 wood elf bard, Cazic-Thule Part of the problem is we can t See the damage or DOT songs are doing. Last night I kept
ygData.messageBody:
> For most of my career, I've been a battle bard, right up there beating on
> the mob with the rest of the tanks. <SNIP> I'm starting to feel a little useless except as a
> crack dealer. Can anyone help me out here?
>
> Robynn Merrilin, level 40 wood elf bard, E'ci
> Check out the E'ci server webpage! http://www.geocities.com/eciserver

BUMP Moonflower Bllue, level 40 wood elf bard, Cazic-Thule

Part of the problem is we can't "See" the damage or DOT songs are
doing. Last night I kept having to tell my party "I got that one !" when
it "Died" from my drum combo (FCC and COF) just trying to let them know
I wasn't being a slackard :( ...felt like a fool but kept telling
myself if Moon doesn't promote herself then no one else will... and
since there was a 43rd enchanter who 3 times I had to explain that I WAS
playing clarity, it just didn't have a symbol, he had to "look at the
'head clears' message" I knew these folks wouldn't appreciate the more
subtle stuff a Bard does.
Sure be nice if we could get Verant to report the DAM we are doing
with our songs.
